example.text: The family moves to another house at night *trace* to conceal shabby belongings from neighbors.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mrs. Marcos and her late husband, former Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos, were charged *trace* with *trace* embezzling more than $100 million from that country and then fraudulently concealing much of the money through purchases of prime real estate in Manhattan.
